title: Curse Breaker
description: Kalissandra Doe has spent her life in and out of mental institutions since she was found wandering the streets of Brooklyn, NY as a child. Her dreams have always been haunted by Viktor or his beastly side, the minotaur. Neither left despite the numerous treatments and combinations of drugs given to her over the years.Soon after being released from a mental institution, Kalissandra Doe is kidnapped and transported a world away to a remote Island in the pacific. Directly into the arms of Seth Ngozi, Head of the Minotaur Corporation, the world’s puppeteer, and the wrong brother.Kali discovers more than the secrets of her past that she has yearned to know and could never search for. She must be reborn and break the Curse of the Minotaur or die trying…Will Kali accept her fate and become the Goddess she is meant to be? Can she reassemble the Osiris stone in time to resurrect Viktor?★Sit back and enjoy this compelling dark fantasy novella by International Bestselling Author, Jaclyn Roche.★⚠Curse Breaker is an Insta-Love Stand Alone Novella of the Dark Legends series. It includes dark themes and fated mates.⚠
author: Jaclyn Roche
